title: Honor 1, No rewards?
body:
Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
Players issued a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this year’s rewards. Bans that started before 8/22/2017 will not disqualify a player, even if the ban period extended past that date.
Players banned for boosting during the 2017 season remain ineligible for rewards.
Players who experience fraud-related or erroneous bans will still be eligible.

Those are the Eligibility Rules for the 2017 season. I'm honor 1, got a 10 game chat restriction a few months back. When I got it I was put in honor 0, didn't flame for a long time and got honor 1 + rewards back. Based on the eligibility rules I should have gotten my rewards, but I see everyone has Insignias except me D;. Feelsbadman, is this how it's supposed to be or am I just a toxic dude that doesn't deserve rewards?

replies.body: Rewards will be going out over the month, so if you don't see yours yet no worries. Feel free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when all of the rewards have gone out if you still haven't seen yours.

Actually no-one has their rewards yet.

Don't stress out, all the loading screen stuff and profile things you see are from last season. You will get your rewards along with everyone else in time.
